short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Avoid platform censorship by getting warned of potential trigger words.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unoffender checks your internet comments for "trigger words" contained in platform leaks, typical censor filters and censorship-AI training sets.

It is fully functional, but this is the initial publishing, so there might be bugs.
